did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Riverside Quartz Mine (Tuolumne County, Calif.) Records,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Riverside Quartz Mine (Tuolumne County, Calif.) Records, M0071, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Quartz mine located on the Stanislaus River in Tuolumne County, California.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Legal documents, deeds, stock certificates, and by-laws pertaining to the Riverside Quartz Mine.

did.unittitle: Mine Papers 1860 -1863
